job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's or master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related technical field.

jd: From: zaid, Panzer zaid.khan@panzersolutions.com Reply to: zaid.khan@panzersolutions.com Hi ,How are you doing well!My name is Zaid Khan, and I am a certified LinkedIn Recruiter currently working as a Talent Acquisition Specialist at Panzer Solutions LLC. We specialize in both IT and non-IT recruitment services across the U.S. I wanted to inform you about an exciting opportunity we have with one of your preferred clients. If you're available and interested, please let me know. You can also send me your updated resume and the best contact number for a quick follow-upImmediate Interview Backfill RolePosition:- CCAI Engineer Job Type:- RemoteDuration: Long Term As a CCAI Designer for Google CCAI (Contact Center Artificial Intelligence), your primary responsibility will be to lead and manage the development and execution of technical projects related to CCAI. You will be working with a cross-functional team of engineers, product managers, and designers to ensure the successful delivery of CCAI products. • Technical Leadership: You will provide technical leadership to the engineering team, ensuring that technical solutions are scalable, reliable, and meet the needs of the business. You will also be responsible for identifying technical dependencies and driving the resolution of technical issues.• Good knowledge of GCP CCAI service, Dialog flow CX, Agent Assist.• Experience in driving conversational bots for various channels (web, voice etc.) projects.• Experience in user-centric conversation experiences involving chat, text or voice• Experience in Telecom domain and processes.• Design and Architecture: You will work with the design team to review the technical architecture of CCAI solutions. You will also be responsible for ensuring that the design is aligned with business objectives and meets the needs of our customers.• Strong understanding of the understanding, sentiment analysis, Intent classification, dialog flows etc• Innovation and Technology Trends: You will keep up to date with emerging technologies and trends in the AI/ML domain and identify opportunities for innovation and improvement. You will also work with the product management team to ensure that CCAI solutions are competitive and meet the needs of our customers.• Cross-functional Collaboration: You will work closely with product management, design, user research, and other cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on project objectives, timelines, and deliverables. You will also work with external partners and vendors to deliver technical solutions.• Communication and Stakeholder Management: You will be responsible for communicating technical issues and risks to stakeholders at all levels of the organization. You will also work closely with senior leaders to ensure technical objectives are aligned with overall business objectives. • Qualifications:• Bachelor\\'s or master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related technical field.• Experience in software engineering, with experience in the AI/ML domain.• Strong technical leadership skills with experience leading complex technical projects.• Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to identify and mitigate technical risks and issues.• Strong communication and stakeholder management skills, with the ability to work effectively with senior leaders and external partners.• Expertise working in an Agile development environment short sprint.• Strong Experience (~3+ years) in projects related Telecom domain and processes.• Good knowledge of GCP CCAI service, Dialog flow CX, Agent Assist & some experience in telecom domain with contact center technologies and workflowsWarm Regards,Zaid Khan| Talent AcquisitionPanzer Solutions LLC50 Washington Street, 9th Floor,SONO Corporate Center - Norwalk CT 06854Email: zaid.khan@panzersolutions.comNotice of Confidentiality:The information contained herein is intended only for the confidential use of the recipient. If the reader of this message is neither the intended recipient, nor the person responsible for delivering it to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that you have received this communication in error, and that any review, dissemination, distribution, or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you receive this in error, please notify the sender immediately by telephone, and destroy this e-mail message OR reply with the subject "REMOVE" or "Unsubscribe" such that your email would be taken out of our distribution list. You can also forward your "REMOVE" or "Unsubscribe" emails to mailto:info@panzersolutions.com
